title: A discourse upon Gondibert an heroick poem / written by Sr. William D'Avenant ; with an answer to it, by Mr. Hobbs.
author: D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668.
notes: Commendatory poems on the author's Gondibert, by Edmund Waller and Abraham Cowley.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
"The ansvver of Mr. Hobbs to Sr. William D'Avenant's preface before Gondibert": p. 119-145 [i.e. 147].
